BlushieCharm.Name: Charm of Blushie
BlushieCharm.Tooltip:
Your hearts shall spell the doom of your enemies
Can be used by any class
Made in celebration of blushiemagic's love

ElementalEye.Tooltip:
Permanently increases the number of accessory slots to 7
Can only be used if the Demon Heart has been used

ElementalSprayer.Name: Elemental Sprayer
ElementalSprayer.Tooltip:
Uses gel for ammo, 75% chance to consume gel
Yo I heard you like debuffs, so I...

Uses 2 minion slots in total

EyeballTome.Name: Eyeball Tome

Move while using for the best results.
Yo I heard you like debuffs, so I...

MoltenBar.Tooltip:
'Pulsing with heat energy'
The first item bluemagic123 ever made

PuriumOreGen.Name: Purium Infuser
PuriumOreGen.Tooltip: Creates pockets of concentrated purity underground

SixColorShield.Name: Six-Color Shield
SixColorShield.Tooltip: Creates elemental energy to protect you when damaged.

ChaoticSoul.Name: Chaotic Soul
ChaoticSoul.Tooltip: 'The essence of everything, mashed into chaos'

RitualOfEndings.Name: Ritual Of Endings
RitualOfEndings.Tooltip:
Brings the wrath of the End unto the world
Can be reused infinitely

BlueDroplet.Name: Blue Droplet
BlueDroplet.Tooltip:
Used by the Clentamistation
Imbues the Hallow

BubbleshieldPotion.Tooltip:
Increases defense by 12 and reduces damage taken by 12%
Incompatible with Ironskin and Endurance

DarkBlueDroplet.Name: Dark Blue Droplet
DarkBlueDroplet.Tooltip:
Used by the Clentamistation
Imbues Glowing Mushrooms

GreenDroplet.Name: Green Droplet
GreenDroplet.Tooltip:
Used by the Clentamistation
Imbues the Purity

IceKey.Name: Ice Key
IceKey.Tooltip: A key to a different dimension

LunarwalkPotion.Name: Lunarwalk Potion
LunarwalkPotion.Tooltip:
30% increased movement speed and allows the control of gravity
Incompatible with Swiftness

MahoganyKey.Name: Mahogany Key

Used by the Clentamistation

Used by the Clentamistation
Imbues the Crimson

SkywareKey.Name: Skyware Key
SkywareKey.Tooltip: A key to a different dimension

SpitePotion.Name: Spite Potion
SpitePotion.Tooltip:
12% increased damage and critical strike chance
Incompatible with Wrath and Rage

StoneKey.Name: Stone Key
StoneKey.Tooltip: A key to a different dimension

SunlightPotion.Name: Sunlight Potion

Emits a strong aura of light and increases night vision
Incompatible with Shine

WaterKey.Name: Water Key
WaterKey.Tooltip: A key to a different dimension

WoodKey.Name: Wood Key
WoodKey.Tooltip: A key to a different dimension

DungeonShield.Name: Holy Knight's Shield
DungeonShield.Tooltip:
Grants immunity to knockback
Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team when above 25% life
You and players on your team take 7% reduced damage

PaladinStaff.Name: Paladin Staff
PaladinStaff.Tooltip: Summons a mini paladin to fight for you.

PhantomBlade.Name: Phantom Blade
PhantomBlade.Tooltip: Projects a phantom blade when swung

PhantomShield.Name: Phantom's Shield
PhantomShield.Tooltip:
Reduces damage taken by 7%
Players on your team receive this bonus as well

PhantomSphere.Name: Phantom Sphere
PhantomSphere.Tooltip: Summons a phantom sphere around you

CelestialLegend.Name: Celestial Legend
CelestialLegend.Tooltip:
Turns the holder into a werewolf at night and a merfolk when entering water
Increases to all stats

CelestialSeal.Name: Celestial Seal
CelestialSeal.Tooltip:
30% increased magic damage
Greatly increases pickup range and effectiveness of stars

CrystalDestroyerScope.Name: Crystal Destroyer Scope
CrystalDestroyerScope.Tooltip:
Increases view range for guns (<right> to zoom out)
25% increased ranged damage and critical strike chance

CrystalVeil.Name: Crystal Veil
CrystalVeil.Tooltip: Causes crystals to fall and greatly increases length of invincibility after taking damage

DestroyerSeal.Name: Destroyer Seal
DestroyerSeal.Tooltip:
25% increased damage
20% increased critical strike chance

FlamingCrystalGauntlet.Name: Flaming Crystal Gauntlet
FlamingCrystalGauntlet.Tooltip:
Increases melee knockback and inflicts fire damage on attack
25% increased melee damage and speed

InfinityScarab.Name: Infinity Scarab
InfinityScarab.Tooltip:
Greatly increases your max number of minions
Greatly increases the damage and knockback of your minions

MoonlightCharm.Name: Moonlight Charm
MoonlightCharm.Tooltip:
Provides huge life regeneration and greatly reduces the cooldown of healing potions
Increases pickup range and effectiveness of hearts

PurityShield.Name: Purity Shield
PurityShield.Tooltip:
Mount - Encases you inside a shield of purity
Infinite flight and +10% purity shield fill rate
Hold the jump key to move more slowly

CleanserBeam.Name: Cleanser Beam
CleanserBeam.Tooltip:
Cleanse your foes, one line at a time.
Wipes out everything within the beam.
No enemy armor can survive the destruction!

DanceOfBlades.Name: Dance Of Blades
DanceOfBlades.Tooltip:
Dance the dance of death.
Purifies the screen of enemies.

PrismaticShocker.Name: Prismatic Shocker
PrismaticShocker.Tooltip:
Dissolve your foes in a dazzling display.
<right> to turn off the lights.

VoidEmblem.Name: Emblem of the Void
VoidEmblem.Tooltip:
Summons a void emissary to fight alongside you.
Does not interfere with your piercing projectiles

PuriumBreastplate.Name: Purium Breastplate
PuriumBreastplate.Tooltip:
10% increased damage and critical strike chance
Increases your max number of minions by 1

PuriumHat.Name: Purium Hat
PuriumHat.Tooltip:
15% increased throwing damage, 10% increased throwing critical strike chance
20% increased throwing velocity, 33% chance to not consume thrown item

PuriumHeadgear.Name: Purium Headgear
PuriumHeadgear.Tooltip:
15% increased magic damage, 10% increased magic critical strike chance
+80 maximum mana and 15% reduced mana usage

PuriumHelmet.Name: Purium Helmet
PuriumHelmet.Tooltip:
15% increased melee damage, 10% increased melee critical strike chance
16% increased melee speed, 4% increased movement speed

PuriumMask.Name: Purium Mask
PuriumMask.Tooltip:
50% increased minion damage
Increases maximum number of minions by 4

PuriumVisor.Name: Purium Visor
PuriumVisor.Tooltip:
15% increased ranged damage, 10% increased ranged critical strike chance
25% chance to not consume ammo

PuriumAnvil.Name: Purium Anvil
PuriumAnvil.Tooltip: Used to craft items from elemental bars

PurityTotem.Name: Purity Totem
PurityTotem.Tooltip: Summons a purity wisp to fight for you.

PuriumArrow.Name: Purium Arrow
PuriumArrow.Tooltip:
Leaves a trail in its path
The trail does not interfere with your piercing projectiles

PuriumStaff.Name: Purium Staff
PuriumStaff.Tooltip: Casts a controllable sphere of purity

Checkpoint1.Name: The First Ritual
Checkpoint1.Tooltip:
Enrages the Spirit of Purity at 80% health
Can be reused infinitely
Each player starts with {0} lives

Checkpoint2.Name: The Second Ritual
Checkpoint2.Tooltip:
Enrages the Spirit of Purity at 60% health
Can be reused infinitely
Each player starts with {0} lives

Checkpoint3.Name: The Third Ritual
Checkpoint3.Tooltip:
Enrages the Spirit of Purity at 33% health
Can be reused infinitely
Each player starts with {0} lives

CheckpointS.Name: The Final Ritual
CheckpointS.Tooltip:
Enrages the Spirit of Purity at 1 health
Can be reused infinitely
Each player starts with {0} lives

PuriumCoin.Name: Purium Coin
PuriumCoin.Tooltip: Can be crafted to and from 100 platinum coins

RitualOfBunnies.Name: Ritual Of Bunnies
RitualOfBunnies.Tooltip:
Enrages the Spirit of Purity
Can be reused infinitely
Each player starts with 10 lives
Spirit of Chaos must be defeated first
WARNING: Use this in the middle of a large open area (eg. the sky)
It is highly recommended that you use the Purity Shield [i:4038] mount
